title: Kindness Patrol
name: Kindness Patrol
description:
A Map by Karin

Open ended project designed around erecting monuments to acts of Kindness.  All are invited to participate, all are encouraged to look for kindness around them.  
For more information about monuments and project ideas go to:
www.kindness.dynamitefamily.com

properties.name: Bestowed with a bestow magnet
properties.description: Posted by Jason2347 nw kearney st, portland, orjust found in on the car this morning, so nice.

properties.name: Guerrilla DIY Sidewalk Horse-Tie
properties.description: Posted by Hive   NW 3rd near Glisan, Portland, ORmysterious metal working activist artist installed this horse-tie in a fresh municipal curb pour.

properties.name: Hey Jason, flyers
properties.description: Posted by JasonNW Irving and 22nd, Portland, OREmiko really got a kick outta these, she\'s hasn\'t ever met another Jason, and was very suspicious about my claims that there really are more Jason\'s than just myself.

properties.name: Kindness Patrol
properties.description: Posted by Karinan act ov general kindness was witnessed hereA gentleman smiled and tipped his hat to a complete stranger in greeting. :)

properties.name: Kindness Patrol
properties.description: Posted by KarinTwo friends shared a joke and a hug, by the conversation snippet I heard, one was trying to cheer another up after a difficult class. :P

properties.name: University of Illinois
properties.description: Posted by Karin The Kindness Patrol was created by Jacob, Josh, Young Joo and Karin as a part of the Mobilemapping for everyday spaces course @ the University of Illinois, Spring 2006.

properties.name: kindness patrol
properties.description: Posted by ArthurdentureA minivan yielded the right of way for an unusually long time when not obligated to do so at all, allowing several other cars that had been waiting for a long time to successfully pass.
